EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at World ATM Congress 2019, March 12-14, in Madrid, Spain
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Nokia would like to invite you to join us at World ATM Congress 2019, March 12-14, in Madrid, Spain.
Ambitious strategies and performance targets set by ICAO as part of the Aviation System Block Upgrades (ASBU) framework and global Communication Navigation and Surveillance plans have created a string of challenges for ANSPs globally. A key challenge is the continued support of legacy applications and services during the required move to the IP network environment addressed in the framework.
At our stand #891, Nokia will demonstrate innovative technologies for mission-critical domestic, airport and international networking as well as managed service options that can help ANSPs meet these challenges and more. We will also showcase the latest drone and air-to-ground innovations designed to address the unique needs of ANSPs. World ATM Congress, March 12-14, 2019 – IFEMA, Feria de Madrid, Spain
Key topics featured at the Nokia ATM Theater <[[https://www.worldatmcongress.org/nokia-atm-theatre]]>:
Tuesday, March 12, 11:30 to 12:50 Moving toward a New Communication Strategy Guest Speaker: Ingjerd Kvande, Avinor
Wednesday, March 13, 12:10 to 12:40 Next Gen Aircraft Communication Speaker: Sawanjit Singh
We hope to see you in Madrid.
Best regards,
Nokia
